overview.description: UI/UX analysis of the workout tracking application's user journey and interface design.

strengths.item: Clean, minimalist design with good use of white space and hierarchy
Clear workout plan organization with distinct sections for different muscle groups
Intuitive exercise logging interface with step-by-step set tracking
Consistent use of system-native UI elements for familiarity
Good visual feedback on progress with set counters (e.g., "Set 2 of 3")
Effective use of color to highlight interactive elements (blue accent color)

navigation.issue: Consider adding a more visible back button or gesture hint for returning to weekly view
navigation.suggestion: Implement a subtle animation or indicator for swipe-to-go-back gesture

exercise_logging.issue: Weight input field could benefit from a more prominent visual treatment
exercise_logging.suggestion: Add unit selector (lbs/kg) next to weight input
Consider adding quick-input buttons for common weight increments

visual_feedback.issue: Activity graph appears empty in screenshots
visual_feedback.suggestion: Add empty state illustration or onboarding hint for new users
Consider showing sample data visualization during first use

interaction_design.issue: History/progress icons (clock and bars) lack clear purpose indication
interaction_design.suggestion: Add tooltips or labels on first interaction
Consider adding preview of what these buttons reveal

step.feedback: Clear presentation of workout days and exercises
Good visual distinction between days and exercise types
Progressive disclosure works well for set-by-set logging
Activity visualization needs more prominent empty state handling

accessibility_considerations.item: Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG guidelines for text readability
Add VoiceOver labels for all interactive elements
Consider larger touch targets for weight/rep adjustments
Implement dynamic type support for text scaling

priority.item: Add empty state design for activity graph
Implement unit selection for weight input
Enhanced visual feedback for set completion
Additional customization options for workout plans
